casebody.data:
Christopher P. MCCLANCY, et al.
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, N.A., et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 29, 2017

Kenneth A. Votre, in support of the petition.

Pierre-Yves Kolakowski, in opposition.

The plaintiffs' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn. App. 408, 168 A.3d 658 (2017), is denied.
